00023 #ifndef KGLPoint_H
00024 #define KGLPoint_H
00025 
00026 #include <vector>
00027 
00028 #include <QtGui/QColor>
00029 #include <QtCore/QPointF>
00030 #include <QList>
00031 #include <QVector>
00032 
00033 #define KGLPOINT_PARAM_NUMBER 8
00034 
00035 class KGLPoint;
00036 class KGLPointList;
00037 
00038 class KGLPoint
00039 {
00040     public:
00041         explicit KGLPoint();
00042         explicit KGLPoint(const QPointF &p, const QColor &c = Qt::white, const QPointF &t = QPointF());
00043         explicit KGLPoint(float x, float y, const QColor &c = Qt::white, const QPointF &t = QPointF());
00044     
00045         inline QPointF tex() {
00046             return QPointF(m_tx,m_ty);
00047         }
00048     
00049         inline QColor color() {
00050             QColor c;
00051             c.setRgbF(m_r,m_g,m_b,m_a);
00052             return c;
00053         }
00054     
00055         inline void setTex(const QPointF &t) {
00056             m_tx = t.x();
00057             m_ty = t.y();
00058         }
00059     
00060         inline void setColor(const QColor &c) {
00061             m_r = c.redF();
00062             m_g = c.greenF();
00063             m_b = c.blueF();
00064             m_a = c.alphaF();
00065         }
00066     
00067         inline void setAlpha(float a) {
00068             m_a = a;
00069         }
00070     
00071         inline QPointF toQPointF() {
00072             return QPointF(m_x, m_y);
00073         }
00074     
00075         inline float x()
00076         {
00077             return m_x;
00078         }
00079 
00080         inline float y()
00081         {
00082             return m_y;
00083         }
00084 
00085         inline float red()
00086         {
00087             return m_r;
00088         }
00089 
00090         inline float green()
00091         {
00092             return m_g;
00093         }
00094 
00095         inline float blue()
00096         {
00097             return m_b;
00098         }
00099 
00100         inline float alpha()
00101         {
00102             return m_a;
00103         }
00104 
00105         inline float texCoordX()
00106         {
00107             return m_tx;
00108         }
00109 
00110         inline float texCoordY()
00111         {
00112             return m_ty;
00113         }
00114     
00115     private:
00116         float m_x;
00117         float m_y;
00118         float m_r;
00119         float m_g;
00120         float m_b;
00121         float m_a;
00122         float m_tx;
00123         float m_ty;
00124 };
00125 
00126 class KGLPointList : public QVector <KGLPoint>
00127 {
00128     public:
00129         KGLPointList();
00130 
00131         float * array()
00132         {
00133             return (float*)data();
00134         }
00135 
00136         float *vertexStart()
00137         {
00138             return array();
00139         }
00140 
00141         float *colorStart()
00142         {
00143             return &(array())[2];
00144         }
00145 
00146         float *texCoordStart()
00147         {
00148             return &(array())[6];
00149         }
00150 };

00152 #endif //KGLPoint_H
